charities.name: Trocaire
charities.description: Trocaire focuses on alleviating poverty and promoting justice globally. Donations support emergency relief efforts and long-term development projects.

charities.name: Unicef
charities.description: Unicef works to improve the lives of children around the world. Donations help provide vaccines, education, and emergency aid to children in need.

charities.name: Dogstrust
charities.description: Dogstrust is dedicated to the welfare of dogs, offering shelter and finding new homes for them. Donations fund rescue operations and support for abandoned dogs.

charities.name: Phibsboro Cat Rescue Center
charities.description: Phibsboro Cat Rescue Center is committed to rescuing and rehoming stray and unwanted cats. Donations help with veterinary care, shelter, and adoption services.
